about_the_game:
Bring some class to the apocalypse with this series of flashlight effects!

This DLC includes the following flashlight effects:
Rainbow - Experience a beautiful rainbow as your flashlight transitions to each color smoothly.
Vitals - Show your health or poison status with your flashlight.
Treasure - A glowing beautiful golden flashlight.

Change your flashlight effect in the Options menu from the Main Menu.

content_descriptors.notes: Outbreak: The New Nightmare contains blood and gore, both from humans and monsters.

detailed_description:
Bring some class to the apocalypse with this series of flashlight effects!

This DLC includes the following flashlight effects:
Rainbow - Experience a beautiful rainbow as your flashlight transitions to each color smoothly.
Vitals - Show your health or poison status with your flashlight.
Treasure - A glowing beautiful golden flashlight.

Change your flashlight effect in the Options menu from the Main Menu.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
